DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy Subcutaneous Nerve Stimulation ( SQS ) ( also know Peripheral Nerve Stimulation [ PNS ] ) reduction chronic , intractable post-surgical back pain adult .
DOC.brief_title: Subcutaneous Nerve Stimulation Failed Back Surgery Syndrome ( FBSS ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study multi-center , prospective , randomize ( 1:1 ) parallel-group design .
DOC.criteria: Key Have persistent back pain least 6 month Had back surgery least 6 month ago Have try pain medication physical therapy Read understand write English Spanish Male nonpregnant female . If female childbearing potential , sexually active , must use medicallyacceptable method birth control study participation Willing able undergo surgical implant procedure , attend visit schedule , comply study requirement Have expect lifespan great 12 month Key Have leg pain addition back pain . Currently enrol plan enroll another drug and/or device study Have peripheral vascular disease , peripheral neuropathy , smallfiber neuropathy , fibromyalgia Have active systemic infection immunocompromised Will expose diathermy anticipate need fullbody MRI scan Currently implantable cardiac pacemaker , defibrillator , neurostimulator Treated spinal cord stimulation , peripheral nerve stimulation , intrathecal drug delivery system require additional back surgery
